quotes.quote: Just because someone carries it well doesn’t mean it isn’t heavy.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Taking a break is also a part of putting in work. Rest is crucial for preparation and recovery.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: When you finally begin to receive things you’ve always wanted, you understand why it was important for you to wait. Some things require a certain level of maturity and experience to be fully appreciated.
quotes.author: Terence
